godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: I got drunk alone. In AA we get sober together

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: In God's sight, all human beings are important

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: Walk your talk

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: Once you give love, you receive love

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: You get back what you give out

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: You aren't responsible for anyone's happiness but your own

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: You attract what you were

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: There are no mistakes, just learning experiences

godshot.quote: Want to hear God laugh? Tell him your plans

godshot.quote: Humility is not thinking less of yourself, it is thinking of yourself less often

godshot.quote: Alcoholics all drink for the same reason - any reason

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: Some days are diamonds, others just rough stones

godshot.quote: Get out of the problem and into a solution

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: Live life on life's terms

godshot.quote: Don't expect to learn about people from books; a person can't fit in a bookcase

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: When I react to someone, that person becomes my Higher Power

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: When you need something in your life to replace alcohol, work a step

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: My recovery is a process, not an event

godshot.quote: HOW? Honesty, Open-mindedness, Willingness

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: Do good, be good, and God will be with you

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: At meetings, leave your credentials and your intellect at the door

godshot.quote: If you make a twelfth step call and you Don't drink, It's successful

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: Twelfth Step: If they're ready, you can't say anything wrong. If they're not, you can't say anything right

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: Alcohol is patient; your disease will wait for you forever

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: Life is slippery when wet

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: Let it begin with me

godshot.quote: We've each got our own self-improvement kit

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: Learn to listen so that you can listen to learn

godshot.quote: You never know what you're addicted to until you stop

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: It's alright to plan; just Don't plan the results

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: Fear is the absence of faith

godshot.quote: The bad news: Nobody is coming to rescue you. The good news: You can save yourself

godshot.quote: I Don't ever want to have to stop drinking again

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: I can never help another alcoholic without helping myself

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: I am where I am because that's where I am supposed to be

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: The long journey to sobriety begins where you are

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: Tranquilisers are nothing more than solid alcohol

godshot.quote: Pass it on

godshot.quote: I have a choice

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: Alcohol: Ignorant oil

godshot.quote: I'm here because I Don't want to live like I used to live

godshot.quote: There is little you can count on in life except feeling bad after that first drink

godshot.quote: Long sobriety does not mean greater immunity from drinking again

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: Poor me, poor me, pour me another drink

godshot.quote: Go to meetings, when you want to, when you need to and at eight o'clock

godshot.quote: Now I can wake up and say "Good morning, God!" rather than "Good God, it's morning!"

godshot.quote: Many doctors believe alcoholics suffer from a tranquiliser deficiency

godshot.quote: AA ruined my drinking

godshot.quote: If you Don't remember your last drunk, you haven't had it yet

godshot.quote: When I go to extremes, I'm sure to find misery close by

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: Learn humility or you will be humiliated

godshot.quote: People Don't come into AA because they're having a wonderful life

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: How has my family suffered because I quit drinking?

godshot.quote: God gives us what We're going to need

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: Think! Think! Think!

godshot.quote: As long as you can stay sober, God can talk to you

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: When I turned myself over to God, I took my like out of the hands of an idiot

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: AA makes us into the people we were supposed to have been

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: When you Don't know what to do, Don't drink and go to meetings

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: About AA - I didn't like it, I didn't believe it, and it worked

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: Alcoholism: Physical allergy and mental obsession

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: Once you have been in AA a while, you can be honest and truthful, because you've stopped doing things you are ashamed of

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: When you go to a meeting, you're working the Twelfth Step

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: If I had waited to be happy until I was well, I would still be sick

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: F.E.A.R: False, Evidence, Appearing Real

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: Things aren't different anywhere you go

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: AA is a million-dollar program purchased five cents at a time

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: Today I lead a life I approve of

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: If you want to get ahead until you learn to be here

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: Even the hereafter begins with here

godshot.quote: Keep an open heart

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: You can change only yourself, not the rest of the world

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: Take a year off from worrying

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: I am not the center of the universe

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: Each day of sobriety is a testimonial to my attempt to be a human being

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: When the world comes to an end, it will do so without my permission

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: If I can keep my feet on the ground, God can come down to me

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: To climb a ladder, It's necessary to go up the steps

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: What I have to do is simple; It's just not very easy

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: I thought AA would teach me how to drink, but I already knew how to drink. AA taught me how to live

godshot.quote: I only drank when I wanted to; I just wanted to all the time

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: One drink: one drunk

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: How do you resign from AA? Take a drink

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: When you can't decide if you made the right choice, you probably you probably didn't make either the best or worst choice

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: There are no accidents

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: I can't do this by myself

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: Come to meetings to see those you want to be like as well as those you Don't

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: If you have a slip, you lose a lot more than just sober time

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: If you pray for a Cadillac and God sends a jackass, ride it

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: Think of what you have rather than what you lack

godshot.quote: When I was drinking I had my own little world, and it was getting smaller all the time

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: I have everything I need

godshot.quote: If you still feel you have to be number one in what you do, then be the most human human being

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: Everything you do is a step toward recovery or toward relapse

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: The program of recovery is taking your old set of values and replacing it with a new one

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: I'm not supposed to be drunk

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: I drank to kill the pain I couldn't explain

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: After you get rid of alcohol, you have to deal with the other isms

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: The worst AA meeting I ever attended was better than my best drunk

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: Think about your thinking

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: You can lead a horse to water, but you can't get it to buy the drinks

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: If you let them do it for you, they will do it for you

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: Miracles can happen if no one cares who gets the credit

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me

godshot.quote: We talked ourselves to insanity, and we can talk ourselves back

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: What you think you are, you are not; but what you think, you are

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: It doesn't take much to get people on your side

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: God wasn't lost. I was

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: When I'm useful, I feel good

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: You can't get drunk if you Don't take that first drink

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: God gives us only what we can handle

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: I couldn't; God could

godshot.quote: God can't hand you a new life until you let go of the shot glass

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: It's not okay for me to tell you I'm okay when I'm not okay, okay?

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: Happy, joyous, and free

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: I am my own problem

godshot.quote: It's possible to be addicted to sadness

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: The door to AA swings both ways

godshot.quote: A whisky glass made a horse's ass out of me

godshot.quote: Remember your last drunk before you pick up your next drink

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: I'm only an arm's length away from my next drink

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: There are enough boozers out there - they won't miss me

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: Alcohol was my stength; then I learned it was my weakness

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: Sobriety is the greatest gift I have ever received

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: I didn't grow up planning to be an alcoholic

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me

godshot.quote: It's not what you want to do that matters; It's what you do

godshot.quote: The race is often won not by the swiftest, but by the person who manages to keep running

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: Staying sober is my most important business today

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: Alcoholism is the only disease that will tell you you Don't have it

godshot.quote: We plan our slips

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: When all else fails, read the directions - the Twelve Steps

godshot.quote: I have an incurable, fatal disease which can be arrested one day at a time

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: I remember the lessons learned the hard way; the easy ones I forget

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: All I wanted was to control you, myself, and everything else

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: All is well, even when it ain't

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: In AA the only mistake you can make is not coming back

godshot.quote: My disease is an elephant. As long as I remember It's there, I won't get stepped on

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: Let what is given be enough

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: You must be, before you can do

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: If I Don't drink today, more will be revealed

godshot.quote: There is nothing wrong with motivation - the key is in what motivates you

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: Life does not have to be a daily struggle

godshot.quote: I accept that I cannot drink, but that does not mean that I will not drink again

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: In AA you've got to surrender to win

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: The good is the enemy of the best

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: God, grant me the serenity to accept the things I cannot change..

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: When I joined AA, I realised I could run toward my problems

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: Things won't get better because you joined AA, but you will

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: Since I came to AA, I can take a trip without taking a trip

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: God will remove only the character defects that stand in your way of helping others

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: Pain is inevitable, suffering is optional

godshot.quote: The further I'm away from my last drunk, the closer I am to my next drink

godshot.quote: My alcoholism is simple: When I was drunk, I felt okay

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: you've got to be willing to be willing

godshot.quote: Don't compare

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: You are not alone

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: Before you drink, throw your desire chip in the gutter and know that soon you will follow

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: I must change me, not the geography

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: The musts, oughts, and shoulds in your life can drive you crazy

godshot.quote: Try praying. Nothing pleases God more than to hear a strange voice

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: How to stop drinking: Bend your knees instead of your elbows

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: No matter what, things can only get worse if you drink at them

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: The urge is going to pass whether you drink or not

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: There was never enough in the bottle to satisfy me

godshot.quote: When I joined AA, I lost my innocence about my drinking

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: Reality can be hell when you're only visiting

godshot.quote: Constructive criticism: I tell you what is wrong with you. Destructive criticism: You tell me what is wrong with me

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: God, save me from myself

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: Anything you would be ashamed of doing and have not done yet, you will do if you pick up another drink

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: We're all here because We're not all here

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: Come to meetings to see what happens to people who Don't come to meetings

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: Sick, sorry, then sober

godshot.quote: God, when I speak, please fill my mouth with good stuff and give me a nudge when I've said enough

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: Plan for tomorrow, but live just for today

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: Please everybody and no one is pleased; please yourself and at least you're pleased

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: Happiness doesn't come from getting what we want, but from enjoying what we have

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: When I help, I am helped

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: To recover, you need something to do and someone to love

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: Nothing changes until it becomes real

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: There is enough time to accomplish all that is necessary

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: You can't expect to live a trashy lifestyle and belong to AA

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: My mind is out to get me

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: When I joined AA, I quit selling myself cheap

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: With this program I can be a decent person

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: The elevator of alcoholism goes only down, but you can get off where you'd like

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: The longer I stay sober, the more I remember I'd forgotten when I was drinking

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: Alcoholics are all from the same nut tree

godshot.quote: Before AA I had this equation: Self-worth = my performance + the opionions of others. I could never get it to balance

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: My problems are self-made

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: Sober life can be distresstin, but not dangerous

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: My worst day sober is not nearly as bad as my worst day drinking

godshot.quote: Alcohol endowed me with the delusion of adequacy

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: If you hang around long enough, someone will do the slipping for you

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: The load of tomorrow, added to that of yesterday, carried today makes the strongest falter

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: If I could do any better, I would

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: I need to get the cotton out of my ears and put it in my mouth

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: When the student is ready, the teacher appears

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: As a sponsor, remember you can carry the word, but not the person

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: When alcoholics are ready, you can't keep the program from them; when they're not, you can't give the program away

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: I didn't get what I wanted from AA; I got what I needed

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: I never attended a meeting in which I didn't get something, even if just angry

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: When I was drinking, I was deathly afraid of living

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: AA works very well without me, but I work a lot better with AA

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: I'm harder on myself than anybody else

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: It doesn't matter how you got here or why you got here, just that you're here

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: People, places, and things exist whether I choose to accept them or not. The only choice I have about acceptance is to be either grateful or miserable

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: Spiritual growth comes from being in AA, not just around it

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: We didn't all arrive on the same ship, but We're all in the same boat

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: Not drinking is easy. It's living and not drinking that's hard

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: Come to ninety meetings in ninety days. If you're not satisfied, we'll refund your misery

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: Two realisations have contributed to my spiritual growth: (1) There is a God. (2) I ain't God

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: All I ever wanted when I was drinking was a little more than I ever had

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: Prayers Don't change God. They change me

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: Things I turn over to God most easily are those things already fixed

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: I've failed, but I'm not a failure. I've made mistakes, but I'm not a mistake

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: No one ever arrives at AA too late

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: You can't. God can. Let him

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: When I first got to AA, both my drinker and my thinker were broken

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: Keep your mind and your body in the same place

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: To get along with people, keep skid chains on your tongue

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: Your greatest fear is exactly where your alcoholism was taking you

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: The Serenity Prayer is the handrail to grab until you can work the steps

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: Be careful of what you do or you will get away from what works

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: Alcoholics are noted for their mind-reading ability

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: Cease panic and start prayer

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: If you can't fight and you can't flee, then flow

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: Don't sweat the small stuff, and remember, It's all small stuff

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: Drinking didn't cause my problems, living did

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: What comes from the heart goes to the heart

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: It's a lot easier to stay sober than to get sober

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: Other people's drinking never bothered me until I quit drinking

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: Misery loves miserable company

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: There's nothing more disgusting than being sober in a room full of drunks

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: It takes several years to read the black part of the Big Book - that's the part that's not between the lines

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: You Don't fall off a building when you're standing in the middle.

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: I'm trying to be as honest as I can

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: AA: Absolute Abstinence

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: The catch-22 to recovery: you've got to change your thinking to change your drinking. But to change your thinking, you've got to change your drinking

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: I began to get better when I knew I could choose between being right and getting well

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: The world is not my enemy

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: The practicing alcoholic is the only person in the world who can lie in the gutter and still look down on others

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: If you claim to like everyone you've met in AA, you haven't been to enough meetings

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: Is your mind racing? Try reading the Big Book out loud. Your mind can only do one thing at a time

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: AA meetings are the jumper cables God uses to get love flowing from one alcoholic to another

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: When your time in meetings equals your time in bars, you have a chance to recover

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: An alcoholic who is alone is in bad company

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: If it works, Don't do anything to fix it. If it doesn't work, do anything to fix it

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: Alcoholics Don't have relationships - they take hostages

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: You can't be fired for on-the-job sobriety

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: It's a good day if I haven't harmed myself or anyone else

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: I have to get out of myself to find myself

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: Don't pray for healing and then tell God what to do

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: The only defense you have when you're wrong is to attack

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: you're ready for this program when you've drunk so much you can get neither drunk nor sober

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: Don't become emotionally involved with reality

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: Before I came to AA, I was a human doing, not a human being

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: EGO: Easing God Out

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: We can't see the growth in ourselves, but we can see it in others

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: By going to meetings and working the Steps, I may be able to make compost out of my pile of garbage

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: You can't do it for anyone else

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: You alone can do it, but you can't do it alone

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: We can't take responsibility for the sobriety of others unless We're also willing to take responsibility for their slips

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: If I'm not grateful, I'm hateful

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: It is not God who needs to be thanked, but I who need to be grateful

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: AA is a God-centered program for self-centered people

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: The most miserable person imaginable is the one with a belly full of booze and a head full of AA

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: Alcoholism is not an infectious disease, but it can be contagious

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: God has never been a problem in my life, but I have been a problem to God all my life

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: It is more important to do what must be done than to do all you can do

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: It's not so important how you started your life, but how you finish it

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: When I die, I want to ride in that long black hearse dead sober

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: Live and let live

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: When you come to AA and decide you want what we have, you have to do what we do

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: I know that I'm not yet the person I can be, but I thank God I'm not the person I used to be

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: Liquor used to do things for me and then it began to do things to me

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: Practising alcoholics are the only people who get to choose the disease they die from

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: If you're an alcoholic and you drink, your life can only go downhill

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: I've never met anyone who came back after a slip and said he or she had a good time

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: I drank for just two reasons: to be what I was not and not to be what I was

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: Yesterday is a cancelled cheque, tomorrow is a promissory not, today is cash-on-hand

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: AA won't keep you from going to hell, nor is it a ticket to heaven. But it will keep you sober long enough for you to decide where you want to go

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: If we can only be judged by our enemies, then, as alcoholics, we ourselves are the best judges

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: Before AA I looked at the world through dung-coloured glasses

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: Alcoholism is the attitude disease

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: If you think you're happy, you are. If you think you're wise, you are not

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: When I was drinking, I never beat myself up; I always beat myself down

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: Alcoholic: Someone no one likes and who wouldn't have it any other way

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: It's not what you drink, nor when you drink, nor where you drink, nor with whom you drink, nor how often you drink; It's what that first drink does to you

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: The only alcoholics who aren't guilty of driving when drunk are those who have never driven

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: When I Don't have expectations of others, anything positive they do is a pleasant surprise

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: When I was drinking, I used to try to feel good by buying things I didn't need, with money I didn't have, to impress people I didn't like

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: I must not compare the outside of you with the inside of me

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: It's my attitude toward what happens to me that makes it a "blessin" or a lesson

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: If I reached for enough drinks, my problems wouldn't go away, but I would

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: Since coming to AA, I've become inoculated against the disease of not wanting to live

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: No one was ever as bad to me as I have been to myself

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: Alcohol is the great solvent: It dissolves marriages, finances, careers, and health

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: AA is a fellowship of men and women who know that other people just Don't act right

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: AA is a fellowship of men and women who say "no"

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: The only time alcoholics will say they're not sure is when they're positive they're right

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: AA will do until a cure comes along

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: When you come to AA, you have to learn to be the doctor as well as the patient

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: You will have problems whether or not you stay sober

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: I was willing to go anywhere to get a drink, so I should be willing to go to meetings to recover

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: God's delay in answering our prayers isn't God's denial

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: Faith is the foundation of freedom from fear

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: No pain, no change

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: When I was drinking, there was no middle: I believed I was absolutely perfect or perfectly worthless

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: Acceptance is about what is, not what is not

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: God is my friend now instead of my enemy

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: Tired work is never efficient

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: Taking that first drink is like getting hit with a freight train - It's not the caboose that does the damage

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: You may not need a meeting, but I need you to have a meeting

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: No matter how I lived in the past, I can live right today

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: When I point my finger at you, there are always three fingers pointing back at me

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: If you believe AA members gossip about you, Don't worry. AA members are so self-centered they will be back talking about themselves very soon

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: God doesn't punish us for our alcoholism, we punish ourselves with our alcoholism

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: SLIP: Slight Lapse In Progress

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: Mean what you say, say what you mean

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: I didn't take a drink today, so anything is possible

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: The AA member with the longest sobriety is the one who got up earliest this morning

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: Alcoholics are people who pole-vault over mouse turds

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: Loneliness is curable

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: I can borroe trouble only at high interest rates

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: Alcohol used to cause me to break out in strange spots - London, Paris, Miami Beach

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: I came to AA to save my hide and discovered my soul was attached

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: I worked the Steps not because I saw the light, but because I felt the heat

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: If you free others to be who they are, you'll set yourself free

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: Just because life has been painful so far doesn't mean it has to keep hurting

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: Go for all of it and Don't worry. If you're not supposed to have it, you won't

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: Were we less self-centered, we'd see that blessings and sorrows visit us in equal amounts

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: Life is like the turn of a wagon wheel - sometimes I'm in the sunshine, and sometimes down in the mud

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: In the AA pasture there are lots of chips

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: If you pray, why worry? If you worry after you pray, why pray?

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: Having trouble turning it over to your Higher Power? Remember that your best thinking got you drunk

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: If you made it this far drunk, God won't let you down when you're sober

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: Hang tough!

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: Call your sponsor before, not after, you take that first drink

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: Strive to understand, rather than to be understood

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: To make it work, you have to buy the whole package

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: The evil I dimly perceive in myself I try to stamp out in others

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: Remember, whatever position you find yourself in, you put yourself there

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: We mock the things we are to be
